title: "Deezer: Streaming service to detect and delete 'deepfake' AI songs"
excerpt: "Streaming service Deezer says it has developed technology that allows it to identify and potentially delete songs that clone pop stars' voices. The French company says it wants to \"weed out illegal and fraudulent content\" to protect artists. \"We need to take a stand now,\" CEO Jeronimo Folgueira told the BBC. \"We are at a pivotal moment in music.\""
